name: cuckoo
label: Cuckoo
description: Cuckoo sandbox is an open source software for automating analysis of suspicious files. To do so it makes use of custom components that monitor the behavior of the malicious processes while running in an isolated environment.

fields.title: Server IP
fields.name: server_ip
fields.description: Specify the IP of the Cuckoo sandbox server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations and the API token configured for your account for using the Cuckoo APIs.
fields.tooltip: IP address or the hostname URL of the Cuckoo server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.Default is HTTPS. Must include http:// if not HTTPS.

fields.title: Port Number
fields.name: port
fields.description: Specify the port number of the server on which the API of the Cuckoo sandbox is running.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: Specify the API token configured for your account for using the Cuckoo APIs.
fields.tooltip: Token set in cuckoo.conf under [cuckoo] named api_token

operations.title: Submit File
operations.description: Submits a specific file for detonation on the Cuckoo Sandbox based on the specified reference ID of the file to be analyzed.

parameters.title: File To Detonate
parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify the FortiSOAR™ File IRI to submit files directly from the FortiSOAR™ Attachments module to the Cuckoo sandbox server for analysis. In the playbook, this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

operations.title: Submit URL
operations.description: Submits a specific URL for detonation on Cuckoo Sandbox based on the specified URL to be analyzed.

parameters.title: URL To Detonate
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specify the URL that you want to submit to the Cuckoo sandbox for scanning and analyzing.

operations.title: Get Report
operations.description: Retrieves a report from the Cuckoo server for the files or URLs that you had submitted to the Cuckoo server for analysis. Reports are retrieved based on the task_id of the sample. Based on the report you can determine the reputation of the submitted files or URLs.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: taskid
parameters.description: Specify the Task ID for a previously submitted file or URL for which you want to retrieve an analysis report from the Cuckoo server.
